questions: Do you maintain an asset inventory (hardware/software)?
Do you have a formal vulnerability management program?
Provide evidence of annual penetration testing.

vendor_responses.q: Do you maintain an asset inventory (hardware/software)?
vendor_responses.answer: Yes, via CMDB with monthly reconciliation.

vendor_responses.q: Do you have a formal vulnerability management program?
vendor_responses.answer: Yes, weekly scans and monthly patch cycles.

vendor_responses.q: Provide evidence of annual penetration testing.
vendor_responses.answer: Redacted pentest report summary available upon request.
